articles.description: Conor McGregor is finished & needs Jake Paul fight, says Khabib Nurmagomedov's manager
articles.content:
Conor McGregor’s fighting career is on the wane, if top MMA manager Ali Abdelaziz is to be believed.
For those of you that don't know, Abdelaziz is the manager of key figures and rivals of McGregor,… [+2210 chars]

articles.title: ‘Rahul will do that’: Sachin Tendulkar on what Dravid can deliver as coach of Team India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The team will be led by an experienced campaigner in Shikhar Dhawan while Bhuvneshwar Kumar will be his deputy. Another interesting factor would that former India skipper Rahul Dravid will reportedly be the coach of the side that tours Sri Lanka. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India will tour Sri Lanka for a limited-overs tour in July. With the 26-member Test team in England for the World Test Championship final and a five-match Test series, the BCCI selection committ… [+1983 chars]

articles.title: Daren Sammy to join CWI's Board of Directors, West Indies cricket | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The former captain will serve as an independent non-member director for two years
articles.content: Daren Sammy will serve as an independent non-member director in Cricket West Indies for two years after his appointment was confirmed last Thursday. The Board of Directors approved a second term for … [+1691 chars]
